Message:
With all of us flung into
a vortex by the door,
I was lucky to have
ended up here...
But, I don’t know where
the others wound up.

If they never reach
another world, they might
just keep falling...and falling...!

The peace of the world is
important too, but to me,
my friends are worth even more.

That’s why...
I want to save everyone.

I want to find out why
Elaine did what she did.

And...I want to journey again...
with everyone.

After all...I still love
everyone so much,
even now...

when the going gets tough,
we just gotta face things
with a smile. If you never
let go of hope and keep
putting your best foot forward,
you’ll be blessed with
an angel’s guidance.

That’s what must have
led me to all of you... Right?

I still believe...that I will meet
all of them again someday.

That the day will come
when we can laugh
with each other again.
I just know it!
